quotes.text: The blessing of the Lord makes rich, and he adds no sorrow with it.
quotes.author: Proverbs 10:22

quotes.text: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: The best antidote I know for worry is work.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.text: It is not fitting for a fool to live in luxury
quotes.author: Proverbs 19:10

quotes.text: The prudent sees danger and hides himself, but the simple go on and suffer for it.
quotes.author: Proverbs 22:3

quotes.text: Nothing can dim the light which shines from within.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: There are far, far better things ahead than any we leave behind.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: How much more grievous are the consequences of anger than the causes of it.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Doubt your doubts before you doubt your faith.
quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Try a little harder to be a little better.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.text: Dont struggle when youre all tangled up
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: going downhill is easy....its the uphill thats hard
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: Love is made up of: Trust, Respect, Support, Commitment and Patience. If these 5 attributes exist, love will grow.
quotes.author: Dr Goodman

quotes.text: Just keep swimming-just keep swmming
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: just say so what
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: when life gets hard...just say so what
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: Sometimes feeling tired is ok
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: negatives are temporary, positives last forever
quotes.author: Dr. Goodman
